    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.io.File inputFile)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize game with given input file
        参数:
        inputFile - given input file
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - every exception when read file

      • getScore

        private int getScore​(Cell cell)
        Calculate the score of given pokemon/station
        参数:
        cell - pokemon or station
        返回:
        the score of given pokemon/station

      • getBenefit

        private int getBenefit​(Cell current,
                       Cell next)
        Calculate the benefit of going to station/pokemon current to station/pokemon next
        参数:
        current - current place
        next - next place
        返回:
        the benefit of this move

      • findPath

        private Pair findPath​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> visitList,
                      Player currentPlayer)
        Find the optimal path with highest score
        参数:
        visitList - list of pokemon and stations
        currentPlayer - player
        返回:
        the best path and highest score

      • printPath

        private void printPath()
        Print the best solution in console

      • writeSolutionToFile

        private void writeSolutionToFile​(java.io.File outputFile,
                                 Pair pair)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Write the best solution to given file
        参数:
        outputFile - file to write the solution
        pair - pair containing best path and highest score
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - every exception when write file

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
